title: [API Bug] Cook items have non-zero vendor

comments.author: Yamagawa.5941
comments.body:
Hum. Might explain what I’ve seen on other items.
//Yamagawa
…crafting gadget now in beta…

comments.author: xanthic.9478
comments.body: NM, found the NoSell flag on an item. Guess that fixes that.

comments.author: xanthic.9478
comments.body:
Cooking items list a vendor sell price, but you cannot sell items crafted by cooking to a vendor. I believe this was changed near release?

Can the API values be changed to reflect this fact?
